bt.peer

Interface PeerSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DHTPeerSource, ScheduledPeerSource

    public interface PeerSource
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Peer> getPeers()
      Get the list of peers.
      boolean update()
      Ask to update the list of peers (usually from an external source).

    • Method Detail

      • update

        boolean update()
        Ask to update the list of peers (usually from an external source). Implementations may choose to refuse to perform an update under certain conditions, e.g. when insufficient time has passed since the last update.
        Returns:
        true if the list of peers has been updated; false otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPeers

        Collection<Peer> getPeers()
        Get the list of peers. Implementations should return empty list before update() has been called for the first time.
        Returns:
        List of peers
        Since:
        1.0
